00017 bool isa(const FileNode& _node, const string& _type_name)
00018 {
00019     const CvFileNode* node = reinterpret_cast<const CvFileNode*>(*_node);
00020     if (node->info && node->info->type_name)
00021         return string(node->info->type_name)==_type_name;
00022     return false;
00023 }

00030 void read(FileStorage& fs, MxArray& x, const FileNode& node)
00031 {
00032     if (node.type()==FileNode::SEQ) {
00033         int n = node.size();
00034         vector<MxArray> v(n, MxArray(static_cast<mxArray*>(NULL)));
00035         for (int i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00036             const FileNode& elem = node[i];
00037             int type = elem.type();
00038             if (type==FileNode::INT)
00039                 v[i] = MxArray(static_cast<int>(elem));
00040             else if (type==FileNode::REAL)
00041                 v[i] = MxArray(static_cast<double>(elem));
00042             else if (type==FileNode::STR)
00043                 v[i] = MxArray(static_cast<string>(elem));
00044             else if (type==FileNode::SEQ) {
00045                 MxArray y(static_cast<mxArray*>(NULL));
00046                 read(fs, y, elem);
00047                 v[i] = y;
00048             }
00049             else if (type==FileNode::MAP) {
00050                 if (isa(elem,"opencv-matrix")) {
00051                     Mat m;
00052                     elem >> m;
00053                     v[i] = MxArray(m);
00054                 }
00055                 else if (isa(elem,"opencv-nd-matrix")) {
00056                     MatND m;
00057                     elem >> m;
00058                     v[i] = MxArray(m);
00059                 }
00060                 else {
00061                     MxArray y = MxArray::Struct();
00062                     read(fs, y, elem);
00063                     v[i] = y;
00064                 }
00065             }
00066         }
00067         x = MxArray(v);
00068     }
00069     else if (node.type()==FileNode::MAP) {
00070         for (FileNodeIterator it=node.begin(); it!=node.end(); ++it) {
00071             const FileNode& elem = (*it);
00072             int type = elem.type();
00073             if (type==FileNode::INT)
00074                 x.set(elem.name(), static_cast<int>(elem));
00075             else if (type==FileNode::REAL)
00076                 x.set(elem.name(), static_cast<double>(elem));
00077             else if (type==FileNode::STR)
00078                 x.set(elem.name(), static_cast<string>(elem));
00079             else if (type==FileNode::SEQ) {
00080                 MxArray y(static_cast<mxArray*>(NULL));
00081                 read(fs, y, elem);
00082                 x.set(elem.name(), y);
00083             }
00084             else if (type==FileNode::MAP) {
00085                 if (isa(elem,"opencv-matrix")) {
00086                     Mat m;
00087                     elem >> m;
00088                     x.set(elem.name(), m);
00089                 }
00090                 else if (isa(elem,"opencv-nd-matrix")) {
00091                     MatND m;
00092                     elem >> m;
00093                     x.set(elem.name(), m);
00094                 }
00095                 else {
00096                     MxArray y = MxArray::Struct();
00097                     read(fs, y, elem);
00098                     x.set(elem.name(), y);
00099                 }
00100             }
00101         }
00102     }
00103 }

00110 void write(FileStorage& fs, const MxArray& x, bool root=false)
00111 {
00112     mxClassID classid = x.classID();
00113     if (classid == mxFUNCTION_CLASS || classid==mxUNKNOWN_CLASS)
00114         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid MxArray");
00115     if (classid == mxSTRUCT_CLASS) {
00116         int n = x.numel();
00117         vector<string> fields(x.fieldnames());
00118         if (n>1) fs << "[";
00119         for (int i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00120             if (!root) fs << "{";
00121             for (vector<string>::iterator it=fields.begin(); it<fields.end(); ++it) {
00122                 fs << *it;
00123                 write(fs, MxArray(x.at(*it,i)));
00124             }
00125             if (!root) fs << "}";
00126         }
00127         if (n>1) fs << "]";
00128     }
00129     else if (classid == mxCELL_CLASS) {
00130         vector<MxArray> array(x.toVector<MxArray>());
00131         fs << "[";
00132         for (vector<MxArray>::iterator it=array.begin(); it<array.end(); ++it)
00133             write(fs,*it);
00134         fs << "]";
00135     }
00136     else if (classid == mxCHAR_CLASS) {
00137         string s(x.toString());
00138         fs << s;
00139     }
00140     else {
00141         if (x.numel()==1) {
00142             if (x.isDouble() || x.isSingle())
00143                 fs << x.toDouble();
00144             else
00145                 fs << x.toInt();
00146         }
00147         else {
00148             Mat y(x.toMat());
00149             fs << y;
00150         }
00151     }
00152 }
00153 }
00154 
00162 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00163                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00164 {
00165     // Check arguments
00166     if (!(nrhs>=2&&nlhs==0)&&!(nrhs==1&&nlhs<=1))
00167         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00168     
00169     string filename(MxArray(prhs[0]).toString());
00170     if (nrhs==1) {
00171         // Read
00172         FileStorage fs(filename, FileStorage::READ);
00173         FileNode node = fs.root();
00174         MxArray s = MxArray::Struct();
00175         read(fs, s, node);
00176         plhs[0] = s;
00177     }
00178     else {
00179         // Write
00180         vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs+1,prhs+nrhs);
00181         FileStorage fs(filename, FileStorage::WRITE);
00182         if (rhs[0].isStruct() && rhs[0].numel()==1)
00183             // Write a scalar struct
00184             write(fs, rhs[0], true);
00185         else {
00186             // Create a temporary scalar struct and write
00187             string nodeName(FileStorage::getDefaultObjectName(filename));
00188             MxArray s = MxArray::Struct();
00189             if (rhs.size()==1)
00190                 s.set(nodeName, rhs[0].clone());
00191             else {
00192                 MxArray cell = MxArray::Cell(rhs.size());
00193                 for (int i=0; i<rhs.size(); ++i)
00194                     cell.set(i, rhs[i].clone());
00195                 s.set(nodeName, cell);
00196             }
00197             write(fs, s, true);
00198             s.destroy();
00199         }
00200     }
00201 }
